nodes.text: Tantajoc V predators were organisms native to Tantajoc V in the Tantajo system. They were quite large and were known to attack those that invaded their territory. They were unique in that they they had an incredible healing mechanism which made them immune to the strikes of a lightsaber, as their bodies would quickly repair the wound. The exiled Prince Denid devised a way of destroying the creatures by employing an anti-magnetic polarization ray gun. A blast from a weapon would vaporize the creatures, counteracting their healing properties.
